data.title: Kelly Johnson
data.text:
PME Excellence In Design Award Winners

PME is proud to announce that designs from Harris Consulting Engineers, LLC, of Las Vegas, NV, and KJWW Engineering Consultants of Rock Island, IL, have been chosen to receive PME Excellence in Design Awards for 2004.

Read More

Engineering Firm of the Year: Henderson Engineers, Inc.

PM Engineer is proud to announce that Henderson Engineers, Inc. (HEI) has been named PME's Engineering Firm of the Year for 2003.

Read More

Engineering Firm of the Year--Metro Design Associates, Inc.

Although we received a number of highly qualified entries, Metro Design was chosen as the firm that best epitomized the six criteria established for the Engineering Firm of the Year award.

Read More

ASPE Technical Symposium Focuses on Education

In the shadow of the Gateway Arch in St. Louis, MO, the American Society of Plumbing Engineers held its 2001 Technical Symposium from November 1-4, 2001.

Read More

Engineering Firm of the Year: Bechard Long & Associates

Located in San Diego, BLA has been providing Southern California with design consultant services on a variety of mechanical or electrical projects for 13 years.

NFPA Looks at Health Care Codes, Special Hazards

The 2001 National Fire Protection Association World Fire Safety Congress and Exposition, held May 13-17, attracted 10,210 attendees to the Anaheim Convention Center.

ASPE Elects New Board Members at Annual Convention

The ASPE 2000 Convention and Exposition boasted packed aisles at the Convention Center of the expansive Opryland Hotel in Nashville, TN.

Engineering Firm of the Year: Kluber Engineering & Architecture, Inc.

PM Engineer is proud to announce that Kluber Engineering & Architecture, Inc., has been named the Engineering Firm of the Year for 2000.
